snippet.title: Our Developing Journey | Devlog #1 | South Pole Bebop
snippet.description:
The video doesn't fully show the latest version of the game (0.12v) and its features. It was filmed back in November, hence why certain new features, such as deckbuilding, an in-game currency, and other mechanics, were not described or fully shown. Since November, there have been HUGE changes that we will explain in further videos. The video only focuses on how much improvement we've achieved since the beginning.
—
Play South Pole Bebop demo (0.12v) and wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2184470/South_Pole_Bebop/
—
Join our Discord to find a match: https://discord.gg/2MQXRRSUdU
—
Follow South Pole Bebop:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/southpolebebop
Sentience Game Studio: https://www.sentiencegamestudio.com/

#SouthPoleBebop #indie #indiegame #indiegames #steam #turnbased #pvp #singleplayer #multiplayer #gaming #games #strategy #rpg #devlog
